https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/q8o4c9fRTEs57gVHQd7xEl30yFr.jpg The explosion at Chernobyl was ten times worse than the Hiroshima bomb and was due to a combination of human error and imperfect technology. An account of the sixty critical minutes prior to the explosion of the nuclear power plant on the night of April 26, 1986. Disaster at Chernobyl
